BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.codec.PostgreSQLPacketCodecEngine.handleStartupPhase(ByteBuf, List): 2nd parameter 'out' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.exception.PostgreSQLProtocolException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.PostgreSQLCommandPacketFactory.newInstance(PostgreSQLCommandPacketType, PostgreSQLPacketPayload) does not presize the allocation of a collection

org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.PostgreSQLCommandPacketTypeLoader.getCommandPacketType(PostgreSQLPacketPayload): 1st parameter 'payload' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.payload.PacketPayload instead
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.query.PostgreSQLColumnDescription defines fields that are used only as locals
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.query.PostgreSQLColumnDescription defines fields that are used only as locals

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.query.PostgreSQLDataRowPacket.writeSQLXMLData(PostgreSQLPacketPayload, Object) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method new org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.query.extended.PostgreSQLAggregatedCommandPacket(List) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

org.apache.shardingsphere.db.protocol.postgresql.packet.command.query.extended.PostgreSQLAggregatedCommandPacket.ensureRandomAccessible(List): 1st parameter 'packets' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
